page.title: 19MY FAVOURITE THINGS!
page.content: {SIMON TAGG,}a 12_yr_old Chessington schoolboy, describes some aspects of his life in{1985}... { MY FAVOURITE LESSON I like pottery, because I don't have to do much writing. The teacher is friendly, & not too strict. We make clay models, glaze them, & fire them in the classroom kiln. {MY CHOICE OF CAREER Carpentry appeals to me. I enjoy working with wood in my craft/design lessons. I'd like to make furniture for a living. { MY DEAREST POSSESSION:} I'm very fond of my pet budgie, Neville. It's my task to go down to the shops to buy seed, millet, grit &c. For a special treat, I sometimes use my pocket money to buy cage toys for him.
